attributes.action: Stop illegal immigration via channel crossings with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details:
All immigrants attempting to reach Britain via an illegal channel crossing must be prevented from stepping foot on British soil with immediate effect.  A strong message be sent by removing humanitarian assistance, ie Border Force or RNLI rescuing them and landing them in the UK, and instead escorting them back into French waters. 
Deploy the military to patrol our beaches to arrest any immigrants reaching our shores for immediate deportation to France.
attributes.background: 500 men a day entering Britain illegally being housed and fed at tax payer expense whilst our own Vets, including Gurkhas, are homeless is no longer acceptable. The Home Secretary, Rt Hon Pritti Patel must stop waffling and take immediate action to stop this invasion and protect Britain.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
